### CCGS Alfred Needler Disposal

#### Notice Information
* **Reference Number:** PW-_MER-006-29141
* **Publication Date:** August 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 11, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** September 6, 2023

#### Tender Description

The Canadian Coast Guard requires a contractor to dispose of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Alfred Needler through Ship Breaking. The successful bidder will be responsible for preparing the vessel for transportation, transporting it to an approved site, and breaking it down in an environmentally responsible manner.

#### Key Dates

* Mandatory vessel viewing: August 14, 2023 at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
* Removal of vessel from BIO: October 30, 2023
* Completion of work: August 1, 2024

#### Pre-Qualification

* Bidders may be required to demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements of the tender.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Submission Requirements

* Bids must be comprehensive and include all necessary information.
* The successful bidder will be selected based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Contact Information

* **Kimberly Walker**
* Phone: (506) 429-2815
* Email: [kimberly.walker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kimberly.walker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Exemption from Mandatory Viewing

* Bidders who attended the mandatory vessel viewing for solicitation F7044-230296/A on July 19, 2023 are exempt from attending the August 14 viewing.

#### Trade Agreement

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
